participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Alex loves exploring new interests and capturing moments through photography.
participant_1.background: I'm always wearing a hat. I've a broken arm. My favourite skater is Rob Dryden. My friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and disciplined, Maya values her health and spends her free time reading and honing her skills as a stunt double.
participant_2.background: I only eat kosher. I read twenty books a year. I was raised in a single parent household. I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. I'm a stunt double as my second job.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.
my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.
i am an elementary school teacher.
i am fluent in english spanish and french.
